strapiPost.title: Time to Ramp Up Online
strapiPost.content:
Itâ€™s Small Business Week, and Matchstick Studio is providing 10 easy ways to improve your small business website today!

  • Impressions matter: If you own a business, you know the next few months are the biggest for online traffic. Matchstick loves empowering entrepreneurs, makers, and service providers with high-performing websites. That's why it created Modular Orange.
  • Quality over quantity: Time is of the essence to get your site ramped up. Matchstick Studio recommends checking your mobile-friendly capabilities, SSL security certificate, and content to make sure its fresh and accurate.

Need help or more advice? Learn HERE.
